title: Part One: General Butt-Naked and the Liberian Civil War
itunes:title: Part One: General Butt-Naked and the Liberian Civil War
description:
Robert is joined by Shereen Lani Younes to discuss the Liberian Civil War.

Footnotes:

  1. https://abcnews.go.com/International/penitent-warlord-atoning-20000-war-crimes/story?id=20749940
  2. https://mobile.ghanaweb.com/GhanaHomePage/africa/The-chilling-story-of-a-Liberian-warlord-turned-preacher-1388905 
  3. https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2016/03/14/general-butt-naked-the-repentant-warlord 
  4. https://www.thoughtco.com/brief-history-of-liberia-4019127 
  5. https://thegrio.com/2010/02/01/former-american-slaves-played-oppressive-role-in-liberias-past/
  6. https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2019/12/the-bizarre-case-of-general-butt-naked-and-his-demon-powered-warriors/ 
  7. http://www.thepatrioticvanguard.com/liberia-rampant-ritual-killings-or-gboyo 
  8. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZRuSS0iiFyo&vl=en
  9. https://repository.library.georgetown.edu/bitstream/handle/10822/1040650/Wyszomierski%20Final%20Thesis.pdf?sequence=1
  10. https://scholarworks.iu.edu/journals/index.php/lsj/article/download/4138/3765/13244
  11. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07H3B87RR/ref=dp-kindle-redirect?_encoding=UTF8&btkr=1
